articles.title: How Israel tried to use AI to covertly sway Americans about Gaza - NPR
articles.description: A new report by an Israeli watchdog group ties an Israeli firm to a covert online campaign intended to sway crucial Democratic lawmakers to continue backing Israel’s campaign in Gaza.
articles.content: Websites that appear to covertly target mostly younger, progressive Americans with a pro-Israeli spin on the war in Gaza are linked to a company thats being paid by the Israeli government to sway law… [+6941 chars]

articles.title: Stimulant users caught up in fatal 'fourth wave' of opioid epidemic : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: Hundreds of Americans continue to die every day from overdoses. More of those deaths now involve stimulants like cocaine and meth mixed with fentanyl. Men of color have been hit particularly hard.
